articles.title: Julianne Hough Addresses Fans' Concerns Over Bikini Trampoline Video: 'My Goofy Side Is a Reflection of How Safe I Feel' - PEOPLE
articles.description: Julianne Hough addressed fans' concerns following a "playful" video she posted on Sunday, Sept. 29, documenting her spa day. The professional dancer spent time in a sauna, underwent red light therapy, cold plunged and jumped on a trampoline.
articles.content:
Julianne Hough wants fans to know she has "never been healthier or happier from the inside out."
